text: Ya aap kay apney liye koi soney ka ghar ho jaye ya aap aasman per charh jayen aur hum to aap kay charh janey ka bhi uss waqt tak hergiz yaqeen nahi keren gay jab tak aap hum per koi kitab na utaar layen jissay hum khud parh len aap jawab dey den kay mera perwerdigar pak hai mein to sirf aik insan hi hun jo rasool banaya gaya hun
